original_text: so that your daily life may win the respect of outsiders and so that you will not be dependent on anybody.
korean_text: 이는 외인에 대하여 단정히 행하고 또한 아무 궁핍함이 없게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: so that your daily life may win the respect of outsiders
sentences.korean_translation: 너희의 일상 생활이 외부인들의 존경을 얻도록

sentences.original_text: and so that you will not be dependent on anybody
